title: The Unexplained : A Sourcebook of Strange Phenomena
description: Documented--mysterious riddles of the universe science cannot solve!A searching look at hundreds of baffling facts that defy explanation. Vulcan, the planet that vanishedLunar Light flashesThe Mexican MessiahAncient waterworks in FloridaAn Alpine specter that lures climbers to their deaths
author: William R. Corliss
